multiplechoiceresponse.label: Why is text-to-image generation considered important?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: It allows non-experts to create compelling images using natural language.
It eliminates the need for large-scale image data.
It simplifies the process of deep learning.
It solves all biases present in image-text datasets.
